author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

Simple CSC digi and TP filter for Run-3 studies. Can be plugged into a producer+analyzer module to re-emulate and then analyze the CSC trigger primitives from select chambers at P5. Can also be used to mask certain bad chambers.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Tested on recent ME+2/1/15 data. The data file below contains histograms from events with the ME+2/1/15 in run 345476 during which we had Phase-2 upgrade firmware enabled. After some internal communication it turned out that the chamber was still incorrectly configured, so the comparisons aren't that useful (but the filter works as expected).

[CSC_dataVsEmul_CMS_Run_345476.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/7367034/CSC_dataVsEmul_CMS_Run_345476.pdf)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Simple CSC digi and TP filter for Run-3 studies
